TextLibrary.Text: Take your ship for a test flight around the Erebus System.
Travel to various points in the Erebus System looking for signs of Pirates.
Hunt down a second Pirate in the Erebus System.
Learn how to mine ore on one of Erebus' many asteroids.
Decipher Sable's message and make contact with him.
You must hack your way through two sets of LeapGates to reach the Talus and then the Gemini Systems.
You must answer the call of a distress beacon from Gemini Labs.
You must try and track down whatever it is that escaped from Gemini Labs.
You must respond to a distress call. Another ship in the Elea System is being attacked by Pirates.
You must follow the trail of the creature that escaped from Gemini Labs into the Elysia System and beyond.
You must travel to the Keck System, locate a weapon trader, and buy something to help you fight the modified ships of these mysterious creatures.
You must follow the trail of the ship to the Cygnus System.
You must travel to Jahrwox Prime to inform its people of the destruction on Cygnus II.
You must put together a Mag-Net to try and capture one of the creatures who destroyed Cygnus II.
You must travel to Quesada to speak with the Priests and learn about the creature you have captured.
You must perform a service for the Quesadans as payment for information about the creature.
Travel to the Emporium of Keck to purchase a device that can track ships.
Track the Soulless ships with the Starhound.
Investigate the heaviest trail through the Sirius LeapGate.
Continue following the trail of the Soulless through the Pleione LeapGate.
You must formulate a new plan to locate the Soulless.
You must search the Icarus, Navi and Degani Systems for information about the Luminary Archive.
You must search the Icarus Alpha Moon to try and find the Luminary Archive Facility.
You must search the Luminary Archive for any sign of the Soulless or what they might have been seeking.
You must head to the Terra System to search for more information on the MRI Breeding Program.
You must deliver Sable to a meeting in the Vega System.
You must try to broker an alliance with the Lumina Megacorp.
MRI are seeking you out. You must try to escape them.
You must try to broker a deal with the Trident Megacorp.
You must try to broker a deal with the Cytech Megacorp.
You must try and escape from MRI ships that have been contacted by Cytech.
You must once again discuss the possibility of working with Trident.
You must help Trident defend Plasmia from the Soulless.
You must try to gather intelligence on the Soulless.
You must try to gather intelligence on the Soulless by visiting the Acheron System.
You must search the Systems beyond Acheron for signs of the Soulless.
You must convince the Spirit of Acheron to help you.
You must use the Krystalli heart to locate the Soulless.
You must report back to Trident and receive a new mission.
You must use the Krystalli heart to locate the Gamma Sphere.
You must destroy the Gamma Sphere.
You must finalize your deal with General Tarn of Trident.
Keck have stolen food from a Degani Freighter and headed into the Polaris System. You must track them down and return the food to Degani Prime.
The Degani believe that the Keck government is sanctioning attacks on their freighters. You must try to intercept a transmission that proves this to be true.
Given that you have proved a conspiracy in the Keck government, you must confront them and get them to pay the Degani reparations.
You must distribute food to the Elysia, Alpha Centauri and Corvus Systems.
You must distribute food to the Virgo, Ramses and Vega Systems.
You must distribute food to the Apus, Orion & Delphinus Systems.
The Elysians will pay you 5000 Cr to recover some money owed to them by the Jahrwoxi government.
You must recover both your own and the Elysian money from the Jahrwoxi.
You must travel to Degani Prime and obtain some rare Degani grapes.
You must travel to Pegasus VI and return with some Pegasian brandy.
You must travel to Tucana V and download some important data which must be delivered by hand to the Luminary Archive on Mars.
You must download data from an abandoned Trident ship at Lyra Epsilon and deliver it to the Luminary Archive on Mars.
You must download data from a merchant in the Emporium of Keck and deliver it to the Luminary Archive on Mars.
You must sell data to the Vortraag on Vortraag Prime. You will receive a 1% commission on the sale as a reward.
You must travel to Beta Centauri and teach the scientists on New Australis how to hack LeapGates.
You must track down a heretic - a rogue human who attacked the Emperor. Rumors say that he has fled somewhere out near the rim.
Some Plasmids have a mission for you, but their translator is broken. You must travel to the Emporium of Keck and purchase one.
Many Plasmids have become ill recently. You must find a cure.
Travel to Elysia VI and retrieve some water from a hot spring known to have curative properties.
A statue was stolen from Quesada Prime. It is believed to be on Corvus IV. You must retrieve it.
The statue you retrieved for the Quesadans needs some repairs. Travel to Elea III where their stonemasons will be able to fix it.
The statue you retrieved for the Quesadans now needs to undergo a renewal ceremony. Travel to the Cradle of Quesada in the Theseus System and then to the waters of Plasmia Prime.
Locate a ship that was lost just before the LeapGates failed in the Caelum System.
You must attack the Pirate base on Caelum V as retaliation for an attack on an MRI ship.
You must attack the Pirate base on Quaris IV as further retaliation for an attack on an MRI ship.
You must attack the Pirate base on Quaris II as further retaliation for an attack on an MRI ship.
Deliver some parts to Terra, Keck and Quesada.
Deliver some parts to Alpha Centauri, Pegasus and Leo.
Deliver some parts to Sagitta, Libra and Hydra.
Capture and return a rogue android that has stolen a ship and escaped from the testing grounds on Fornax Prime.
The Jahrwoxi are concerned that Keck Raiders are stealing their crops from the Pleione System. They will pay you to drive the Keck away.
Some Jahrwoxi require safe passage to their favorite holiday resort on Elysia Prime. They will pay well for your services.
The Vortraag require a Dorimuur - a small, but deadly insect native to Delphinus VIII - to be captured for their arena. The animal is well loved by the Plasmids who keep them as pets.
The Vortraag require a Tybbar - a gigantic but harmless animal that only comes out at night - native to Lepus VII. They wish to butcher it in their arena.
The Vortraag require an Omnibarra - a rare and vicious animal - to be captured for their arena. The animal is unique to Cepheus IX and is protected by the Quesadans.
The Vortraag require a Krystalli to be captured for their arena. Krystalli are hunted by the MRI and are difficult to find.
Sly McGee needs some errands run.
Sly McGee knows of some rare and illegal Items for sale...
Sly Mcgee wants to sell you some more Contraband which you can dispose of at your leisure.
Sable believes that information about The Lost (a group of rogue telepaths) may be present on Atlia Sigma. You must search for them.
You must track The Lost to Pleione Rho.
The next of The Lost is at Perseus Sigma. You must track them down.
The next of The Lost is at Leo Epsilon. You must track them down.
The next of The Lost is at Lacerta Omega. You must track them down.
The next of The Lost is at Procyon Epsilon. You must track them down.
The next of The Lost is at Musca Epsilon. You must track them down.
The leader of The Lost is at Typhon Rho. You must track him down.
You must help Pezt get a present for his mate.
ED24 needs an upgrade. It is an old part and can only be obtained from the Emporium of Keck.
Elgara wishes to investigate a presence she senses on the moon below.
You must help the Krystalli escape their home system.
You must help the Krystalli escape their home system.
You must help the Krystalli escape their home system.
You must help the Krystalli escape their home system.
You must help the Krystalli escape their home system.
Lydia is searching for an old friend who was headed towards the Elysia System. You must help her find him.
Lydia and ED24 have detected a distress beacon. You must check it out.
You must try to rescue Lydia's friend.
You must supply things to Gorn, the Slavemaster of the Solis Mine, so he will free Lydia's friend Marc.
You must supply things to Gorn, the Slavemaster of the Solis Mine, so he will free Lydia's friend Marc.
You must supply things to Gorn, the Slavemaster of the Solis Mine, so he will free Lydia's friend Marc.
You must help Lydia take revenge upon Gorn, Slavemaster of the Solis Mine.
Help ED24 repair the abandoned MRI ship. Travel to Asteroid PH549D to begin mining for supplies needed.
You must try to recover the ship from the creature you captured.
Pezt needs to make a brief detour before you can follow the ship. You must take Pezt to the Degani Trader to buy food.
Kirine wants to teach you how to craft Items for your ship.
A secret branch of the MRI wants you to test out new technology.
Nasty Butler needs a demonstration of your mining capabilities.
Nasty Butler wants another combat demonstration or two.
Nasty Butler needs a display of your hacking skills.
You need to gather necessary technological components.
You must gather crystals for the Psionic Attunement.
A necessary component has been given to the wrong ship. You must recover it.
You must now travel to Quesada Prime to perform the attunement.
You can collect your first Psi-Weapon.
One of the Psionic tools is on Jahrwox Prime.

You must trade 25 Tons of Gems for the Item. Hunting Vagabonds One of the Psionic Weapons is in Quesadan space. Information War Lumina is willing to trade their Psionic Weapon but... Your Food or Your Life A minelaying Pirate has been robbing people of their edibles. Vortraag Enough A tournament is being held in Vortraag Space with a grand prize of a Psi-Weapon. The Two Turrets A powerful double-turret is disturbing Cytech trade. There's Time to Pay A Quesadan Priest needs your help battling a transdimensional threat. Libertarian Some Pirates need your help resisting the MRI. Plasmids? Seriously? Amazingly, Plasmids have hijacked an advanced Battleship from Trident.
Harassment: Quesada Gain favor with Lumina by harassing Quesada. Harassment: Pirates Gain favor with the Degani by harassing Pirates. Harassment: Trident Gain favor with Cytech by harassing Trident. Harassment: MRI Gain favor with Quesada by harassing the MRI. Smuggling: MRI Smuggle Contraband purchased with Gold through MRI space. Smuggling: Lumina Smuggle Contraband purchased with Gold through Lumina space. Smuggling: Plasmids Smuggle Contraband purchased with Gold through Plasmid space.
